useCase.name: Update Patient's Medical Record
useCase.trigger: Doctor asks to update a patient's medical record.

mainSequence.step: Doctor asks the system to update the patient's medical record.
System displays the patient's medical record to Doctor. (Actor: Doctor)
Doctor submits the form with allergies, medical conditions, or notations to system.
System displays a confirmation message to Doctor that the information was added to the patient's medical record. (Actor: Doctor)
